subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Awesome Act, a 3-year-old colt based in England, rallied in the stretch to beat Yawanna Twist in the $250,000 Gotham Stakes at Aqueduct.
snippet: Awesome Act, a 3-year-old colt based in England, rallied in the stretch to beat Yawanna Twist in the $250,000 Gotham Stakes at Aqueduct.
